channel.title: USAScape Release V1 [WITH IRC INTEGRATION]
channel.description:
First source to be released, comes with valuable Administration features.
[b]NOTE[/b]: I have only released this on MoparScape.org and RSPSoft.org. If this is found anywhere else, they have taken my codes and leeched me. Please report this to me, and I will deal with it somehow :)
[size=20pt]ANOTHER NOTE: IF I SEE A BOT IN MY CHANNEL, I WILL MESSAGE YOUR SERVER WITH WORDS YOU MAY NOT LIKE. BE SURE TO CHANGE THE IRC SETTINGS TO AVOID THIS.[/size]
I'm going to be honest, the server was set up for a PVP but I never really got to the Leveling and et cetera. All I have set up is a nice Admin system.
Features: - 100% Custom Admin System - Admin system works on IRC (if you don't know what this is and how it works, get off this thread now) - Set up a little PVP; Edge bank is safe, else is wild lol. - Removed thread per client (thanks to stormcutter's tut) - Instant mutes and unmutes, reads directly from file to check for mutes (same for Global Mutes)
Please note that the main purpose of this server is to make something integrated with IRC. The IRC bot framework was created with PIRCBot, so I take no credits for most of their work.
The server [b]IS[/b] jarred, so to be able to edit, you need to decompress it, and make the class files editable (use JAD). The best way to work with this server is to use NetBeans or another IDE, because to run the server it needs to be jarred (this will make the bot work correctly). If someone finds another way thats better than this, please tell me :)
[b]COMMANDS FOR ON IRC[/b] !msg [message] - sends a message ingame [disables upon Global Mute] (LEVEL 0) !tp - gets total number of players online (LEVEL 0) !mcmds - shows you list of moderator commands (LEVEL 2) !acmds - shows you list of admin commands (LEVEL 4)
- Moderator !(un)muteuser [user] - (un)mutes a user ingame (LEVEL 2) !rights [user] - shows the rights of the specified user (LEVEL 2) !getip [user] - gets the specified user's last used IP (LEVEL 3)
- Admin !say [message] - sends a message ingame as admin (LEVEL 4) !lastbans [int] - gets the last specified number of bans (LEVEL 4) !(un)gmute - globaly mutes the server (excludes staff) (LEVEL 4) !(un)banuser [user] - bans a user from the server (LEVEL 4) !(un)ipban [user] - bans an IP from accessing the server (LEVEL 5) !edit [user] [role] - adds a user to a role ingame and on IRC (LEVEL 6)
I created a new playerRights level system aswell. Here is a list of the levels, et cetera:
Level -- Title (description) [IRC Keyword] 0 = Normal Player [player] 1 = Exception (could be used for donator i guess) [except] 2 = Low Mod [lmod] 3 = High Mod [hmod] 4 = Low Admin [ladmin] 5 = High Admin [hadmin] 6 = Server Management [N/A]
You can use the IRC Keywords with the !edit command (only if you are Server Management).
Server management can be declared in the file admin.java. Just go to the bottom, and add the names there. Note that on IRC, the name you have must match your ingame name. If your ingame name is for example [b]Mod Usa[/b], then on IRC, your nick would need to be [b]Mod_Usa[/b] in order to get your rights on IRC.
Here are some pics I took when USAScape was Project Null 317 (I led this Project :) ) A list of current commands on IRC (constantly updating and adding) [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2ageuc.jpg[/img] Sending a message on IRC ingame :) [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2mz9jz7.jpg[/img] Getting the player count on IRC (is bugged :[) [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/15ccas4.jpg[/img] Banning from IRC (works 100% :]). Same for unban, just unbans user. [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/auc9wo.jpg[/img]
cba to add more, just download and run, and it will work lol.
Please post, and give me criticism. I know the server stuff is shitty, but the IRC part is really nice :). Again, if you do not know what IRC is and how it works, do NOT download this.
Do decompress this, open a Command Prompt Console, and then change your directory to the jar's. then type [b]jar -xvf usascape.jar[/b] . Thus will unjar the client and show you all the class files. From there, just use JAD to decompile them :)
Credits: 60% me for creating most stuff and clearing stuff 20% PIRCBot (forget what company made) 20% wL (this is pimpscape source) x% stormcutter for the Removing Thread per Client
SERVER DOWNLOAD LINK [FILE FRONT]: http://files.filefront.com/usascape1rar/;13896459;/fileinfo.html SERVER DOWNLOAD LINK [UPPIT]: http://uppit.com/v/1D0FG657 SERVER DOWNLOAD LINK [MEDIA FIRE]: http://ww.mediafire.com/?sharekey=a1418e2228715325d2db6fb9a8902bda for mediafire, download src.rar for all the .java files. You will need the usascape1.rar aswell, because it contains all of the folders, .cfg, et cetera
JAD DECOMPILER: http://www.varaneckas.com/jad NETBEANS IDE: http://www.netbeans.org/
